channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 降息不确定性令美国投资者撤出股票基金
item.description:
U.S. investors retreat from equity funds on rate cut uncertainty https://t.co/Gr84wTTLOa pic.twitter.com/xzGQloqAEm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: AT&T 在美国的服务在近 10 个小时后恢复。在中断高峰期，报告的中断次数超过 70,000 次。更多信息
item.description:
AT&T services in the US were restored after nearly 10 hours. At peak disruption, more than 70,000 outages were reported. Read more: https://t.co/0iMTmg2Grj pic.twitter.com/PamdsWI4We

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：人工智能的热潮帮助英伟达周四获得了 2,770 亿美元的股票市值，这是华尔街历史上最大的单日涨幅，超过了 Meta Platforms 在 2 月 2 日创下的 1,960 亿美元的单日涨幅纪录。
item.description:
WATCH: The buzz around artificial intelligence helped Nvidia gain $277 billion in stock market value on Thursday, Wall Street's largest one-day gain in history, beating the previous record set by Meta Platforms, which saw a $196 billion gain on February 2 https://t.co/iHG4fnBaBV pic.twitter.com/lrYvj4sTrA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）计划斥资逾 10 亿美元购买矿业资产
item.description:
Elliott Management plans to spend over $1 bln on mining assets, FT reports https://t.co/96czgS3PVr pic.twitter.com/9MyK2L0fFM

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：科技巨头英伟达（Nvidia）的估值在第四季度井喷后接近 2 万亿美元。@rob_cyran 解释了人工智能军备竞赛如何在几年后使该公司的价值大幅提升。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Tech giant Nvidia’s valuation is approaching $2 trillion after a blowout fourth quarter. @rob_cyran explains how an AI arms race might make the company worth substantially more in a few years' time pic.twitter.com/XU0hiWp8jg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：电动汽车制造商Rivian Automotive和Lucid Group的财报显示，需求放缓对其成本高昂的扩产计划产生了影响，这两家公司的股价随之下跌。
item.description:
WATCH: Shares of EV makers Rivian Automotive and Lucid Group tumbled after their earnings reports pointed to the impact of slowing demand on their costly ramp-up plans https://t.co/yZFCwaaPTU pic.twitter.com/jN3VBtG0aS

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：@Rob_cyran说，随着人工智能革命进入最高潮，没有一家公司想被淘汰出局，科技巨头英伟达可能会在几年后看到自己的价值大幅提升
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: With the #AI revolution in top gear and no company wanting to be left out, tech giant Nvidia may see itself worth substantially more in a few years’ time, @rob_cyran says pic.twitter.com/KYAENhKWTv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：梅赛德斯-奔驰的电动汽车需求放缓。这家汽车巨头成为最新一家警告称电池动力汽车需求低迷的汽车制造商。
item.description:
WATCH: Mercedes-Benz has seen electric vehicle demand slow down. The auto giant became the latest carmaker to warn of a low appetite for battery-powered cars https://t.co/geFDQiPpzV pic.twitter.com/ZtZsE2hk0T

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 安联集团第四季度净利润增长近一倍，得益于医疗和人寿业务的发展

item.title: 在问题解决之前，美国 AT&T 用户经历了超过 10 个小时的服务中断。联邦机构正与该公司合作了解原因。更多信息
item.description: AT&T users in the US grappled with over 10 hours of service disruption before the issue was resolved. Federal agencies are working with the company to understand the cause. Read more: reut.rs/3Iu1kHj

item.title: 观看：美国股市收高，英伟达（Nvidia）股价大涨 16.4%，此前该芯片设计公司预计，由于人工智能芯片需求强劲，第一季度营收将增长约三倍。
item.description: WATCH: US markets finished higher as Nvidia shares jumped 16.4% after the chip designer forecast a roughly three-fold surge in first-quarter revenue on strong demand for its AI chips reut.rs/3wys4U0

item.title: 安联集团提高股息，宣布回购股票
item.description: Allianz boosts dividends, announces share buyback reut.rs/3SRwz3y
